reviewText: My nephew loves Dinosaur Train and this was the perfect gift for Valentine's Day!

This DVD contains eight episodes from the Dinosaur Train cartoon. Amazon doesn't always do a good job on their DVD episode listings so here are the episodes that are included on this DVD:

1. Junior Conductor Jamboree
2. Rocket Train
3. Erma Eoraptor
4. Troodon Train
5. Rocket Train 2: Surprise Party
6. Rocket Train 3: New Conductor/Solar Train
7. Train Trouble
8. Ned the Quadruped
Dinosaur Train is very popular in our house!

My two year old LOVES anything dinosaurs and Dinosaur Train is one of his favorites. It does a great job of actually teaching all the types of dinosaurs and lots of facts about them. We love all the characters and the fun songs too! As for my purchase, all the Dinosaur  Train DVDs freeze my DVD player and after asking PBS they say it's not their DVDs but it still happens if I don't take it out as soon as it's over.

I know Amazon doesn't always have the full info on dvds so here are the episodes for this dvd that I obtained when I Googled it

1. King meets Crystal
2. Erma and the Conductor
3. Don's Collection
4. Gilbert visits the nest
My kids love it
Grandkids love it!
